title: Chemical synthesis and super capacitance performance of novel CuO@Cu4O3/rGO/PANI nanocomposite electrode
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13628-13639
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00065J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Abeer Enaiet Allah, Fatma Mohamed, Mohamed A. Ghanem, Ashour M. Ahmed
Copper oxide-based nanocomposites are promising electrode materials for high-performance supercapacitors due to their unique properties that aid electrolyte access and ion diffusion to the electrode surface.
